Uses of Interface
com.xhive.index.interfaces.XhiveIndexIf

Packages that use XhiveIndexIf
com.xhive.index.interfaces This package contains the interfaces for the indexes and index list. 
 

Uses of XhiveIndexIf in com.xhive.index.interfaces
 

Subinterfaces of XhiveIndexIf in com.xhive.index.interfaces
 interface XhiveCCIndexIf
           A Context Conditioned index is created by using the addNodeFilterIndex factory method on the XhiveIndexListIf.
